about_the_game:
The Payday Gang gets contacted with an offer. Renowned smuggler Gemma McShay offers a new and lucrative opportunity in Texas. As a gesture of good will, she sends the crew a shipment of new outfits, allowing the heisters to blend in as they head southbound to Texas.
This bundle contains 3 DLC’s, the first of which, the Southbound Tailor Pack, is now available alongside the bundle. The other two DLC’s, the McShay Weapon Pack and the Midland Ranch Heist, will be released on May 11th and on June 15th respectively. Picking up the bundle will net you a nice discount for purchasing now, and guarantee you immediate access to the DLC’s when they’re released.


The Midland Bundle contains all the following:
  • Southbound Tailor Pack - Releases April 20th
    • 2 Outfits with variations
      • Trailblazer
      • Rough Rider
    • 2 Masks in 7 variations
      • 3 baseball caps
      • 2 cowboy hats
    • 4 Gloves
  • McShay Weapon Pack - Releases May 11th
    • 3 New weapons
      • New LMG
      • New Sniper Rifle
      • New Grenade Launcher
    • 1 New type of grenade
    • 6 New weapon charms
    • 2 New exclusive weapon sets
    • 9 new weapon mods
  • Midland Ranch Heist - Releases June 15th
    • The Midland Ranch Heist
